summary.span: 支援 控制項，並為資料繫結控制項提供與商務和資料物件進行資料作業的介面。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data operations with business and data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別主要為了用於資料繫結控制項，而不是網頁程式碼中的可程式化物件。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 類別實作的資料功能控制，包括， ， ，和作業、 排序、 篩選和設定的管理檢視中保留狀態。The class implements the data functionality for the control, including the , , , and operations, sorting, filtering, and management of settings kept in view state. A每個執行個體建立物件在執行階段類別。A object is created for each instance of the class at run time. 資料作業的執行個體的呼叫類別會由執行個體物件。Calls to data operations of the instance of the class are handled by the instance of the object. 網頁開發人員不會存取執行個體直接類別。Page developers do not access the instance of the class directly. 控制項開發人員可以建立自訂資料控制項擴充和類別。Control developers can create custom data controls by extending the and classes. 類別會使用反映的商務或資料物件上呼叫方法來執行資料作業。The class performs data operations by calling methods on business or data objects using reflection. 在執行階段，控制建立類型所識別的執行個體屬性，然後呼叫適當的方法，對於資料作業。At run time, the control creates an instance of the type that is identified by the property, and then calls the appropriate method for the data operation. 具現化的物件不會快取的記憶體。The instantiated object is not cached in memory by the . 建立物件，並針對每個資料方法呼叫中終結。The object is created and destroyed for every data method call. 如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，不會建立執行個體，但仍會呼叫資料作業方法。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance is not created but the data operation method is still called. 不會直接公開給由網頁開發人員控制項。The is not directly exposed to page developers by the control. 相反地，屬性和方法透過存取。Instead, the properties and methods of the are accessed through the . 例如，的屬性設定的設定屬性。For example, the of property is set by setting the property of the . ## 擷取資料Retrieving Data 資料來源檢視執行的最基本作業會從基礎資料存放區使用的資料擷取方法，擷取資料項目的集合。The most basic operation that a data source view performs is data retrieval from the underlying data storage using the method, which retrieves an collection of data items. 下列資料擷取方法、 屬性和事件由實作物件，並直接以公開其網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following data retrieval methods, properties, and events are implemented by the object and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 更新資料Updating Data 物件支援的資料更新，藉由呼叫商務或資料物件的方法，由屬性。The object supports data updates by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 資料繫結控制項的自動更新，這類執行和控制項，將它們的參數中介面並檢視物件合併這些參數的任何參數時在中找到集合。Data-bound controls that automatically perform updates, such as the and controls, pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 下列的更新方法、 屬性和事件由實作和直接以公開其網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following update methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 插入資料Inserting Data 物件支援插入新的資料列，藉由呼叫商務或資料物件的方法，由屬性。The object supports inserting new rows of data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 資料繫結控制項的自動執行，例如插入、和，其參數中的傳遞介面並檢視物件合併這些參數中所找到的任何參數集合。Data-bound controls that automatically perform inserts, such as the and , pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 下列插入方法、 屬性和事件由實作和直接以公開其網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following insert methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 刪除資料Deleting Data 物件呼叫由商務或資料物件方法來刪除資料的支援屬性。The object supports deleting data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 資料繫結控制項的自動執行刪除，例如和，其參數中的傳遞介面並檢視物件合併這些參數中所找到的任何參數集合。Data-bound controls that automatically perform deletes, such as the and , pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 下列刪除方法、 屬性和事件由實作和直接以公開其網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following delete methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 篩選和排序資料Filtering and Sorting Data 您可以動態篩選的資料時，更強大了擷取資料。Data retrieval is more powerful when you can filter the data dynamically. 篩選為僅支援控制如果方法會傳回或物件。Filtering is supported only by the control if the method returns a or object. 您可以使用和屬性以套用動態篩選，來擷取資料。You can use the and properties to apply dynamic filtering to data retrieval. 這些屬性由實作物件，並直接以公開其控制項資料繫結控制項和其他呼叫端。These properties are implemented by the object and exposed directly by its control to data-bound controls and other callers. 您可以排序的資料，您使用擷取所擷取後，在記憶體中排序資料。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the by ordering the data in memory after it is retrieved. 支援排序只有控制如果方法會傳回或。Sorting is supported only by the control if the method returns a or . 屬性一律會傳回`true`，因為無法判斷何種類型由方法，而不需要呼叫方法。The property always returns `true`, because the cannot determine what type is returned by the method without calling the method. 屬性語法是一樣屬性。The property syntax is the same as for a property. ## 追蹤檢視狀態Tracking View State 實作介面並使用檢視狀態來追蹤其狀態在頁面的要求。The implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 實作， ，和方法可供啟用控制項檢視狀態的追蹤。Implementation of the , , and methods are provided to enable view state tracking for the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會呼叫方法以傳回具有指定的資料來源檢視的新執行個體`viewName`參數。The constructor is called by the method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `viewName` parameter. 控制項都只有一個相關在任何時間，並將永遠檢視`DefaultView`，雖然此命名限制所加諸不控制。The control is associated with only one at any time, and always names the view `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not the . 您可以覆寫方法，以支援使用不同的命名慣例的檢視。You can override the method to support views with a different naming convention. 所傳遞物件`context`由資料來源檢視來存取參數的物件，例如和屬性。The object that is passed by `context` is used by the data source view to access parameter objects, such as and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`，如果屬性設定。The property returns `true`, if the property is set. 方法會傳回計數應該傳回的資料列總數的可以分頁不在頁面中的資料列數目。The method that returns the count should return the total number of rows that can be paged, not the number of rows in a page. 資料繫結控制項使用可以分頁來決定如何呈現分頁控制項的資料列的總數。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 比方說，多少數字頁面巡覽區按鈕中呈現控制呼叫器。For example, how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 如需有關分頁支援的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on paging support, see . 呼叫期間檢查屬性方法，以確保您的資料來源控制項支援所設定的各種要求的所有功能屬性。The property is checked during a call to the method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various properties.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，判斷在作業期間，當基礎資料儲存中資料列中的資料發生變更時， 控制項如何執行更新和刪除作業。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying data storage changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否要將舊的和新值的參數套用至`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 比方說，如果該方法是由指定屬性會傳回物件與資料行`Name`和`Number`，而屬性設定為值的建立參數`Name`和`Number`如`Update`方法。For example, if the method that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果屬性設定為值的名稱建立參數`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Name`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created with the names `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Name`. (取決於原始值參數的完整名稱。)然後會判斷如果的方法，是在指定屬性具有相符的參數。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the .) The then determines if the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 並行存取控制是資料存放區使用的控制如何讀取和多個用戶端存取和管理相同的資料時，存放區中變更資料的技術。Concurrency control is a technique data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一個用戶端讀取資料並呈現給使用者，而另一個用戶端讀取相同的資料，並提供給不同的使用者。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果兩個使用者更新的資料，並送出至資料存放區，無法預料的結果可能會發生，因為兩個用戶端可能會更新為相同的資料不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 這被視為衝突。This is considered a conflict. 藉由設定屬性值`Update`方法可以然後比較舊的和新值來偵測衝突，以及處理它們，視原始資料來源。By setting the property to the value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 選取的值不是其中一個 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為-1，表示已刪除資料列數目未知。The default value is -1, which means that an unknown number of rows were deleted. 若要傳回不同的值，設定屬性物件事件處理常式。To return a different value, set the property of the object of the event handler. 受影響的資料列數目通常由`Delete`方法商務物件，而該值是可從屬性參數事件處理常式。The number of affected rows is typically returned by the `Delete` method for the business object, and that value is available from the property of the parameter of the event handler. 方法呼叫方法，傳遞`keys`和`oldValues`集合。The method calls the method, passing the `keys` and `oldValues` collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，檢查傳回值的值和輸出參數，或判斷是否發生例外狀況之後作業已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 傳回值，輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示一組使用的方法，由所指定的所有員工屬性來擷取資料的`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`、控制自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，作業使用的方法，由指定屬性和任何參數中指定的集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此程式碼範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行作業時，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的作業完成之後，為執行例外狀況處理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由處理這個委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要檢查的實作`EmployeeLogic`中介層商務物件，使用這個程式碼範例，請參閱。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果執行個體方法，商務物件建立和終結所指定之方法的每次呼叫屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 您可以處理事件，以使用之前所指定之方法的商務物件呼叫屬性。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 您也可以處理所指定的方法之後，就會引發的事件呼叫屬性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. 如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理這些事件。If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果商務物件控制項搭配實作一個以上的方法或函式具有相同名稱 （方法多載），資料來源控制項嘗試叫用正確的其中一個，根據一組條件，包括參數在集合。If the business object that the control works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果在參數集合不相符的方法簽章，資料來源擲回例外狀況。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the method signature, the data source throws an exception. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示一組使用的方法，由所指定的所有員工屬性來擷取資料的`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`、控制自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，作業使用的方法，由指定屬性和任何參數中指定的集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此程式碼範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行作業時，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的作業完成之後，為執行例外狀況處理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由處理這個委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要檢查的實作`EmployeeLogic`中介層商務物件，使用這個程式碼範例，請參閱。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和參數中所包含的型別集合的名稱和類型中所指定之方法的參數，必須符合屬性簽章。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 參數名稱會受到屬性且區分大小寫。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case sensitive. 使用提供的參數，例如資料繫結控制項時和、控制項自動合併使用這些參數所提供的集合中已明確指定任何參數資料繫結控制項。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示一組使用的方法，由所指定的所有員工屬性來擷取資料的`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`、控制自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，作業使用的方法，由指定屬性和任何參數中指定的集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此程式碼範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行作業時，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的作業完成之後，為執行例外狀況處理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由處理這個委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要檢查的實作`EmployeeLogic`中介層商務物件，使用這個程式碼範例，請參閱。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料來源控制項是否支援對其擷取的資料集進行分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data source control supports paging through the set of data that it retrieves.

value.span: 如果資料來源控制項支援對其擷取的資料進行分頁則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由分頁控制項由設定， ， ，和屬性並定義`Select`中使用適當參數的商務物件方法。Paging by the control is handled by setting the , , , and properties of the and defining a `Select` method in the business object with the proper parameters. 當屬性設定為`true`、集合包含兩個額外的參數，要求的第一個資料列和要求的資料列數目。When the property is set to `true`, the collection includes two additional parameters for the first row requested and the number of rows requested. 這兩個參數的命名方式所定義和屬性。These two parameters are named as defined by the and properties. `Select`方法應傳回所要求的指定索引處開始的資料列數目。The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows starting at the specified index. 因為資料可能不完整地分配依頁面大小，最後一頁可能會包含較少的資料列。Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows. 因此，要求的資料列數目是實際上會傳回的資料列的最大數目。Thus, the number of rows requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned. 呼叫期間檢查屬性方法，以確保您的資料來源控制項支援所設定的各種要求的所有功能屬性。The property is checked during a call to the method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various properties. 資料繫結控制項相關聯的資料繫結控制項上啟用分頁時，呼叫`Select`方法的起始索引和所需的資料列數目。When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required. 此外，如果屬性設定，將資料繫結控制項之前呈現頁面巡覽區控制項，呼叫的方法。Additionally, if the property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls. 例如，如果控制項具有分頁已啟用頁面大小為 5，而方法會傳回 20，只有 4 個頁面都會顯示在頁面巡覽區。For example, if a control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the method returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承方法，以從基礎資料存放區使用的商務物件中刪除資料。The class implements the inherited method to delete data from an underlying data store using a business object. 無法呼叫網頁開發人員和資料繫結控制項作者方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 執行刪除作業之前，呼叫方法來引發事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理此事件，以檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理之前方法呼叫。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and perform any preprocessing before the method is called. 若要執行刪除作業使用反映以呼叫的方法，由屬性，以及任何相關的參數在`keys`和`oldValues`集合，然後執行它。To perform a delete operation, the uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters in the `keys` and `oldValues` collections, and then executes it. 在作業完成之後，呼叫方法來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes, and to perform any post-processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承將資料插入基礎資料存放區使用的商務物件的方法。The class implements the inherited method to insert data into an underlying data store using a business object. 無法呼叫網頁開發人員和資料繫結控制項作者方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 在執行插入 之前，呼叫方法來引發事件。Before the insert is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理此事件，以檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理之前方法呼叫。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and perform any preprocessing before the method is called. 若要執行插入作業，控制項使用反映以呼叫的方法，由屬性，以及任何相關的參數中`values`集合，並加以執行。To perform an insert operation, the control uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters that are in the `values` collection, and then executes it. 在作業完成之後，呼叫方法來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值、 錯誤代碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 如需有關傳回插入的資料列數目的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on returning the number of rows inserted, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承方法來擷取使用商務物件資料。The class implements the inherited method to retrieve data using a business object. 無法呼叫網頁開發人員和資料繫結控制項作者方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 指定的方法可以有任何方法簽章，但是必須傳回類型的其中一個能夠成功呼叫其下表中列出的控制項。The specified method can have any method signature, but must return one of the types for the control that are listed in the following table to call it successfully. |傳回型別Return type|動作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||傳回方法。The is returned by the method.| ||A使用建立，並由傳回方法。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||第一個的擷取和建立並傳回方法。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||物件會包裝在一個項目，並由傳回方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element and returned by the method.| 執行資料擷取之前，呼叫方法來引發事件。Before the data retrieval is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行作業之前任何前置處理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 若要執行選取的操作，控制項使用反映以呼叫的方法，由屬性，以及任何相關的參數中集合，然後執行它。To perform a select operation, the control uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters that are in the collection, and then executes it. 在作業完成之後，呼叫方法來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes, and to perform any post-processing. 如果方法會傳回物件和快取已啟用，擷取的資料，並在作業期間，將資料儲存至快取。If the method returns a object and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 快取，已捨棄，或重新整理會根據建立指定之組合的快取行為和屬性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. 如果方法會傳回物件和指定屬性，它會評估與提供所有屬性和結果篩選條件會套用到期間資料清單作業。If the method returns a object and a property has been specified, it is evaluated along with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 傳回選取的資料列數目的資訊，請參閱。For information on returning the number of rows selected, see .

exception.span: 傳遞給 方法的 指定資料來源應在擷取資料時執行一些額外工作，以透過擷取的資料啟用分頁或排序，但是資料來源控制項不支援所要求的功能。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承方法來更新使用商務物件資料。The class implements the inherited method to update data using a business object. 無法呼叫網頁開發人員和資料繫結控制項作者方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 中所包含的值`keys`和`values`集合會評估並與包含的任何值合併集合。The values that are contained in the `keys` and `values` collections are evaluated and merged with any values that are contained by the collection. 如果屬性設定為值、 值中所包含的`oldValues`集合使用格式化屬性且也合併。If the property is set to the value, the values that are contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the property and are also merged. 在執行更新作業之前，呼叫方法來引發事件。Before the update operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理更新之前。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an update. 若要執行更新作業，使用反映以呼叫的方法，由屬性，以及任何相關的參數在`keys`集合，並加以執行。To perform an update operation, the uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters in the `keys` collection, and then executes it. 在作業完成之後，呼叫方法來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值、 錯誤代碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 如需有關傳回更新的資料列數目的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on returning the number of rows updated, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定呼叫 屬性所識別之商務物件方法時套用的篩選條件運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the business object method that is identified by the property is called.

value.span: 字串，表示使用 屬性所識別之商務物件方法擷取資料時套用的篩選條件運算式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the business object method identified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援篩選的資料時，才方法會傳回， ，或物件。The control supports filtering data only when the method returns a , , or object. 用於語法屬性是格式字串樣式的運算式。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string-style expression. 篩選運算式語法是相同的語法可接受的屬性因為篩選運算式會套用至屬性傳回從執行物件方法。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 )。如果您加入參數，以便集合，您可以也包含格式字串的預留位置，例如`"{0}"`，在替換參數值的運算式。(For more information, see .) If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders, for example `"{0}"`, in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 根據中的參數索引來取代預留位置集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 您可以包含在參數。You can include parameters in the . 如果參數類型是字串或字元類型，請使用單引號括住參數。If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果參數是數值類型，則不需要引號。集合包含的參數，會評估中發現預留位置。Quotation marks are not needed if the parameter is a numeric type.The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders found in the . 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 建議您驗證您從用戶端接收任何篩選參數值。It is recommended that you validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只會取代篩選條件運算式的參數值並將其以套用所傳回的物件方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果您使用屬性作為安全性考量，以限制所傳回的篩選發生之前，您必須驗證的參數值的項目數目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何顯示篩選的資料使用來自中介層商務物件擷取資料的控制項和控制項來顯示結果。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例中使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示篩選的資料使用來自中介層商務物件擷取資料的控制項和控制項來顯示結果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 控制項可以篩選資料，只時擷取資料的方法會擷取為物件。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a object. 基於這個理由，屬性會識別擷取資料的商務物件方法。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a . 程式碼範例包含、控制項，控制項和**送出** 按鈕。The code example consists of a , a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 根據預設，會填入其中一個 Northwind Traders 員工的名稱。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 顯示員工中的名稱所識別的相關資訊。The displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the . 中要擷取資料的另一位員工， ，輸入員工的完整名稱，然後按一下**送出** 按鈕。To retrieve data on another employee, in the , enter the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 屬性會指定用來篩選所擷取的資料運算式屬性。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the property. 它會使用參數預留位置中所包含的參數進行評估之集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此範例中，參數預留位置會受限於單一引號因為參數類型是可能含有空格的字串類型。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果參數的型別是數值或日期類型，不需要繫結的引號。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 程式碼範例是由兩個基本類別所組成：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`類別，這是封裝商務邏輯的類別。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別，這是包含只需要以載入保存資料與資料層的基本功能的模型類別。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 為了簡單起見，`EmployeeLogic`類別會建立一組靜態的資料，而非從資料層擷取資料。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 它也很有用的此範例中，因為此範例依賴您提供示範篩選 Northwind Traders 員工的完整名稱。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on you to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 如需完整的工作範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別提供的 Web Form 網頁程式碼範例。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms page code examples that are provided. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的傳回值為-1，表示已插入資料列數目未知。The default return value is -1, which means that an unknown number of rows were inserted. 若要傳回不同的值，設定屬性物件事件。To return a different value, set the property of the object of the event. 受影響的資料列數目通常由`Insert`方法商務物件，而該值是可從屬性物件事件。The number of affected rows is typically returned by the `Insert` method for the business object, and that value is available from the property of the object of the event. 方法呼叫方法，傳遞`values`集合。The method calls the method, passing the `values` collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，檢查傳回值的值和輸出參數，或判斷是否發生例外狀況之後作業已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an operation has completed. 傳回值，輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserting As ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler

summary.span: 在 作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件以執行額外的初始化作業專屬於您的應用程式，來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前，控制項執行作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the operation. 參數是可做為所存取的集合屬性，由物件。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例中使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 一開始會顯示新`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制，請按一下**插入** 按鈕。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 屬性會識別哪一種方法執行作業。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 在此程式碼範例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用來執行插入; 不過它需要`NorthwindEmployee`來插入資料的參數。In this code example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 基於這個理由，集合的字串，控制項將會自動是不夠的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委派處理物件事件可讓您操作之前輸入的參數和作業會繼續進行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因為`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`物件做為參數，其中一個是使用字串集合，建立及加入使用參數名稱的集合 (`ne`) 該方法所預期。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings, and then added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用現有的中介層物件做為資料來源，具有類型和方法不是特別針對搭配使用時，您可能會執行這些步驟控制項。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 當執行作業時，所識別的方法呼叫屬性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`物件的方法有包含參數，參數的方法簽章集合必須包含其名稱符合的方法簽章參數的參數方法順利完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 程式碼範例是由兩個基本類別所組成：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`類別，這是無狀態的類別封裝商務邏輯。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別，這是包含只需要以載入保存資料與資料層的基本功能的模型類別。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 額外`NorthwindDataException`提供類別是為了方便起見。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 如需完整的工作範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全實作，因此您會將資料插入 Northwind Traders 資料庫時嘗試使用這個範例。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果執行個體方法，商務物件建立和終結所指定之方法的每次呼叫屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 您可以處理事件，以使用之前所指定之方法的商務物件呼叫屬性。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 您也可以處理所指定的方法之後，就會引發的事件呼叫屬性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. (`Dispose`呼叫時，只有當商務物件會實作介面。)如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理這些事件。(`Dispose` is called, only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果商務物件物件實作一個以上的方法或函式具有相同名稱 （方法多載），資料來源控制項嘗試叫用正確的其中一個，根據一組條件，在中包含的參數集合。If the business object that the object implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果在參數集合不符合所指定之方法的屬性簽章，資料來源擲回例外狀況。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the method specified by the property signature, the data source throws an exception. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何顯示篩選的資料使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例中使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 一開始會顯示新`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制，請按一下**插入** 按鈕。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 屬性會識別哪一種方法執行作業。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 在此程式碼範例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用來執行插入; 不過，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`來插入資料的參數。In this code example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 基於這個理由，集合的字串，控制項將會自動是不夠的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委派處理物件事件可讓您操作之前輸入的參數和作業會繼續進行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因為`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`物件做為參數，其中會使用字串集合來建立並加入至使用參數名稱的集合 (`ne`) 該方法所預期。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用現有的中介層物件做為資料來源，具有類型和方法不是特別針對搭配使用時，您可能會執行這些步驟控制項。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 當執行作業時，所識別的方法呼叫屬性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`物件的方法有包含參數，參數的方法簽章集合必須包含其名稱符合的方法簽章參數的參數方法順利完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供先前的程式碼範例所使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the previous code example uses. 程式碼範例是由兩個基本類別和其他類別所組成：The code example consists of two basic classes and an additional class: - `EmployeeLogic`類別是無狀態的類別，封裝商務邏輯。The `EmployeeLogic` class is a stateless class, which encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別是模型類別，其中包含只需要以載入保存資料與資料層的基本功能。The `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class, which contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. - 額外`NorthwindDataException`提供類別是為了方便起見。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 如需完整的工作範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全實作，因此您會將資料插入 Northwind Traders 資料庫時您試驗這個程式碼範例。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和參數中所包含的型別集合的名稱和類型中所指定之方法的參數，必須符合屬性簽章。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 使用提供的參數，例如資料繫結控制項時和、控制項自動合併使用這些參數所提供的集合中已明確指定任何參數資料繫結控制項。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何顯示篩選的資料使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供的範例實作`Insert`第一個程式碼範例中使用的方法。The second code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 一開始會顯示新`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制，請按一下**插入** 按鈕。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 屬性會識別哪一種方法執行作業。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 如果您按一下**插入** 按鈕，作業使用的方法，由指定屬性和任何參數中指定的集合。If you click the **Insert** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此程式碼範例中，一個參數指定集合對應至監督員的識別碼。In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the supervisor's ID. 這是因為即使 ID 會顯示在集合控制項作為物件時，會以字串形式傳遞給控制項。This is because even though the ID is displayed in the collection for the control as a object, it will be passed as a string to the control. 明確地將它加入集合屬性設為值，它會傳遞正確給方法的`int`，不如`string`。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property that is set to the value, it will be passed correctly by the to the method as an `int`, not as `string`. 當執行作業時，所識別的方法呼叫屬性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`物件的方法有包含參數，參數的方法簽章集合必須包含其名稱符合的方法簽章參數的參數順利完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/CS/objds8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/VB/objds8vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供的範例實作`Insert`先前的程式碼範例會使用的方法。The following code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that the preceding code example uses. `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper`方法加入至`EmployeeLogic`中間層物件，以便更輕鬆地使用物件控制項在 Web 案例中，而不實際的商務邏輯的大量重寫。The `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper` method is added to the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier object to enable the object to work more easily with the control in Web scenarios, without a substantial rewrite to the actual business logic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會自動呼叫的商務物件來建立和使用反映它的執行個體的預設建構函式。The control automatically calls the default constructor of a business object to create and instance of it using reflection. 處理事件，明確地呼叫另一個建構函式，以便將結果儲存至的物件執行個體設定屬性相關聯的物件。Handle the event to explicitly call another constructor and to set the instance of the object that results to the property of the associated object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 如果識別來執行資料作業的方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，則和永遠不會引發事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised.

summary.span: 取得或設定格式字串，套用至傳遞給 或 方法之原始值的參數名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of the parameters for original values that are passed to the or methods.

value.span: 字串，表示套用至傳遞給 或 方法之任何 名稱的格式字串。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any passed to the or method.

value.span: 預設值為 "{0}"，表示參數名稱只是欄位名稱。

span.span: The default is "{0}", which means the parameter name is simply the field name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字串套用至主索引鍵，例如識別與`DataKeyNames`屬性的資料繫結控制項，或在刪除和更新的案例，其中屬性設定為值和會傳遞至相對應的資料方法的原始值組。The format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios, where the property is set to the value and the set of original values that are passed to the corresponding data method. 兩個常見的案例，您可能會在其中變更屬性如下：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 若要區分在更新舊的和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 當屬性設定為值參數的原始和新的值都會加入集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 而格式化的字串，不會為每個資料欄位建立具有相同名稱的兩個參數。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 藉由變更原始值參數的名稱，您可以比較原始資料來源偵測衝突，並比較索引鍵值的資料。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 有些視覺化設計工具會實作特定的命名配置，針對原始值和索引鍵。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys. 值儲存檢視狀態中。The value of the is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示一組使用的方法，由所指定的所有員工屬性來擷取資料的`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`、控制自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，作業使用的方法，由指定屬性和任何參數中指定的集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此程式碼範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行作業時，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的作業完成之後，為執行例外狀況處理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由處理這個委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要檢查的實作`EmployeeLogic`中介層商務物件，使用這個程式碼範例，請參閱。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來， 物件檢視狀態的變更。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項，也就是執行個體屬性的類別。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 值然後之後的伺服器控制項存留期的儲存狀態階段保存到字串物件。The value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 檢視狀態內容儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端`Hidden`項目。When view state is saved, view state contents are returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以覆寫來改善效率方法與修改`ViewState`伺服器控制項屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理檢查傳回值的值和輸出參數，或判斷是否在資料擷取作業完成後，已擲回例外狀況的事件。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a data retrieval operation has completed. 傳回值，輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件以執行額外的初始化作業專屬於您的應用程式，來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前控制項執行資料擷取作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the data retrieval operation. 參數是可做為所存取的集合屬性，由物件。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項叫用以擷取資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to retrieve data.

value.span: 字串，表示 用於擷取資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to retrieve data.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可以有任何方法簽章，但是必須傳回順序的下表所列的型別能夠成功呼叫它的控制項The specified method can have any method signature but must return one of the types listed in the following table in order for the control to call it successfully |傳回型別Return type|動作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||傳回方法。The is returned by the method.| ||A使用建立，並由傳回方法。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||第一個的擷取和建立並傳回方法。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||物件會包裝在一個項目，並由傳回方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element and returned by the method.| 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果是執行個體方法，建立及終結每次商務物件方法呼叫。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method is called. 您可以處理事件，以使用之前所指定之方法的商務物件呼叫屬性。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 您也可以處理所指定的方法之後，就會引發的事件呼叫屬性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. (`Dispose`實作的商務物件時，才會呼叫介面。)如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理這些事件。(`Dispose` is called only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果商務物件控制項搭配實作一個以上的方法或函式具有相同名稱 （方法多載），資料來源控制項嘗試叫用正確的其中一個，根據一組條件，包括參數在集合。If the business object that the control works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果在參數集合不符合所指定之方法的簽章屬性，資料來源會擲回例外狀況。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the signature of the method specified by the property, the data source throws an exception. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項可以顯示資料使用Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 識別部分或完整限定的類別名稱及其屬性和方法，呼叫以擷取資料以其屬性。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在執行階段，建立物件，並使用反映來呼叫方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控制項列舉所傳回的集合，然後顯示資料。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the , and then displays the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和參數中所包含的型別集合的名稱和類型中所指定之方法的參數，必須符合屬性簽章。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 使用提供的參數，例如資料繫結控制項時和、控制項自動合併使用這些參數所提供的集合中已明確指定任何參數資料繫結控制項。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取單一資料記錄使用控制項，然後再顯示中的資料記錄控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control, and then display the data record in a control. 藉由呼叫會擷取特定員工記錄`GetEmployee`方法`EmployeeLogic`類別。The retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee`方法要求員工識別碼參數。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控制使用物件存放至其集合傳遞至 ID`GetEmployee`方法。The control uses a object in its collection to pass an ID to the `GetEmployee` method. 若要檢視的範例實作`EmployeeLogic`類別和`GetEmployee`方法，請參閱。To view the example implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class and the `GetEmployee` method, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立物件的執行個體控制項繫結至、 控制項使用反映來載入執行階段的型別名稱識別的型別。To create an instance of the object that the control binds to, the control uses reflection to load the type that is identified by the type name at run time. 因此，值屬性可以是位於 Bin 或 App_Code 目錄中的程式碼的不完整的類型或全域組件快取中註冊的程式碼的完整限定的類型名稱。Therefore, the value of the property can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directory or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果您使用全域組件快取，您必須加入至適當的參考`assemblies`Machine.config 或 Web.config 組態檔的區段。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項可以顯示資料使用Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 識別部分或完整限定的類別名稱及其屬性和方法，呼叫以擷取資料以其屬性。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在執行階段，建立物件，並使用反映來呼叫方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控制項列舉所傳回的集合並顯示資料。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the and displays the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，檢查傳回值的值和輸出參數，或判斷是否發生例外狀況之後作業已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an operation has completed. 傳回值，輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件假設的方法，由屬性會執行更新一次，而不是批次中。The object assumes that the method that is identified by the property performs updates one at a time, rather than in a batch. 這個方法可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果執行個體方法，商務物件建立和終結所指定之方法的每次呼叫屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 您可以處理事件，以使用之前所指定之方法的商務物件呼叫屬性。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 您也可以處理之後，就會引發的事件方法呼叫。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method is called. (`Dispose`呼叫時，只有當商務物件會實作介面。)如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理這些事件。(`Dispose` is called, only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果商務物件物件搭配實作一個以上的方法或函式具有相同名稱 （方法多載），資料來源控制項嘗試叫用正確的其中一個，根據一組條件，包括參數在集合。If the business object that the object works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果在參數集合不符合所指定之方法的簽章屬性，資料來源會擲回例外狀況。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the signature of the method specified by the property, the data source throws an exception. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項，控制項，以及數個控制項更新資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 顯示名稱`NorthwindEmployee`，雖然控制項可用來輸入和更新位址資訊。The displays the name of a `NorthwindEmployee`, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因為集合包含物件繫結至選取的值，觸發程序的按鈕員工選取之後，才啟用作業。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that triggers the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected.
